name: ovh
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing ovh cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`ovh` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/ovh/terraform-provider-ovh).

logFormat.description: Type of format to decode. One of "RFC5424", "LTSV", "GELF", "CAPNP"

logFraming.description: Indicates how messages are delimited. One of "LINE", "NUL", "SYSLEN", "CAPNP"

customHostname.description: Set up the server using the provided hostname instead of the default hostname.

installRtm.description: set to true to install RTM.

installSqlServer.description: set to true to install sql server (Windows template only).

noRaid.description: set to true to disable RAID.

postInstallationScriptLink.description: Indicate the URL where your postinstall customisation script is located.

postInstallationScriptReturn.description: Indicate the string returned by your postinstall customisation script on successful execution. Advice: your script should return a unique validation string in case of succes. A good example is 'loh1Xee7eo OK OK OK UGh8Ang1Gu'.

resetHwRaid.description: set to true to make a hardware raid reset.

sshKeyName.description: Name of the ssh key that should be installed. Password login will be disabled.

useDistribKernel.description: Use the distribution's native kernel instead of the recommended OVH Kernel.

useSpla.description: set to true to use SPLA.

provider.description:
The provider type for the ovh package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
